id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

merge_request_iid.description: The internal ID of the merge request.

a_mode.description: Old file mode of the file.

b_mode.description: New file mode of the file.

diff.description: Diff representation of the changes made on the file.

new_file.description: Indicates if the file has just been added.

renamed_file.description: Indicates if the file has been renamed.

deleted_file.description: Indicates if the file has been removed.
